abstract: This weekend, a special Cars section examines how automakers are meeting tougher mileage standards while still offering high performance and comfort.
snippet: This weekend, a special Cars section examines how automakers are meeting tougher mileage standards while still offering high performance and comfort.
lead_paragraph: With small cars back in vogue, Saab on the ropes and used cars commanding new-car prices at the dealership, The Times offers a special Cars section, which examines the forces that are shaping and buffeting the auto industry.
